content: No Trump fan by a long shot, but really, what’s the alternative with N. Korea… just let ’em keep on building and testing more nukes and ICBM’s until they finally figure out how to get it ‘right’? And that’s before we even get to their ability to sell and distribute the same nasty tech to other ‘bad actors’?! North Korea Tried to Sell Nuclear-Weapon Material Last Year — WSJ
